content: वहः [वह्-कर्तरि अच्] {@--1@} Bearing, carrying, supporting &c. {@--2@} The shoulder of an ox. {@--3@} A vehicle or conveyance in general. {@--4@} Particularly, a horse. {@--5@} Air, wind. {@--6@} A way, road. {@--7@} A male river (नद). {@--8@} A measure of four {%Droṇas%}. {@--9@} A current, stream.
